title: iPod [still] sucks
body: /. has a nice little article about how the <a href="http://slashdot.org/article.pl?sid=04/03/19/1343251">iPod won't be able to save Apple</a>. Maybe a <a href="http://ern.hopto.org/blog/archive/2004/03/19/158.aspx">$200 mouse</a> will be able to? ;-)
